comment: The first thing you need to know is that this is an Architecture class, it is going to be difficult. Mr. McGrath knows this and works with you. If you ask him for help he will help direct you but in the end you decide what you want to do. He is one of the easier professors for studio while still being difficult. Leave class early expect to fail!!!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: He is eager to help those that want to excel. He critiques your work in a way that makes you think outside the box to help you improve. If you are willing to put forth the effort in your work then this is the professor for you. Some students expected this to be a walk in the park, were rude, hardly attended and expected an A. Doesnt work that way

First things first, don't come into this major thinking that it is going to be easy. In my class we had two people who barely showed up to class and when one of them did show up, she complained the whole time. Ryan gives good feedback and hes relatively fair when it comes to grading. If you get a D or you fail it's because you deserve to.

Obviously this is the mans first time teaching or first time in front of a large group of people. He doesnt understand the concept of studio. He will give you overwhelming assignments and you will have to do them at home because he literally spends the entire 4 hours going around judging work. No breaks and holds class if hes not done talking.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK
